com.github.bradylange.ovalgraphics.window

Class OvalUpdater

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.bradylange.ovalgraphics.window.OvalUpdater
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class OvalUpdater
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener

    Displays a specific number of Ovals as graphics on a window which contains four buttons that will either change one random Oval's color or location or change all of the Ovals colors or locations.

    Implements ActionListener which allows it to handle events, such as when a button is clicked on the graphic user interface.

    Depends on:

    • Oval
    Since:
    1.0 (03/25/2019)
    Version:
    1.0.0 (03/25/2019)
    Author:
    Brady Lange - LinkedIn

      Color all Ovals button.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      OvalUpdater()
      Constructs a OvalUpdater object that makes an application window, adds buttons that change the Oval's location or color, creates colors, and adds numOvals random Ovals.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
      Overrides the interface ActionListener's method actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent) to specify the actions carried out when moveOneBtn, moveAllBtn, colorOneBtn, or colorAllBtn is clicked.
      private void addButtons()
      Adds the moveOneBtn, moveAllBtn, colorAllBtn, and colorAllBtn to the window.
      private void addOvals()
      Adds the specified number of Ovals (numOvals) to the window.
      private void colorAll()
      Colors all of the Ovals using one of the specified colors randomly.
      private void colorOne()
      Colors one random Oval using one of the specified colors randomly.
      private void makeColors()
      Instantiates the colors used for the Ovals.
      private void makeWindow()
      Creates the window shell of the application.
      private void moveAll()
      Moves all of the Ovals using x and y location coordinate points.
      private void moveOne()
      Moves one random Oval using x and y location coordinate points.
